ygData.subject: RE: [cantera] Information about species and elements
ygData.msgSnippet: Dan, For species names, use method speciesNames : names = speciesNames(gas) For the elemental composition, method nAtoms(gas) is supposed to return a matrix

Dan,

For species names, use method 'speciesNames': 

names = speciesNames(gas)

For the elemental composition, method 'nAtoms(gas)' is supposed to
return a matrix 'A' such that A(k,m) is the number of atoms of element m
in species k. But it seems this method didn't make it into the MATLAB
interface. I need to update several parts of the MATLAB interface
anyway, to be consistent with the latest (unreleased) kernel used by the
C++ and Python interfaces, so I'll add this method. I'll let you know
when it is ready - probably in a few days.

Dave
